snippet: T.P.C. Harding Park in San Francisco will host the Match Play Championship in 2015, the P.G.A. Championship in 2020 and the Presidents Cup in 2025.
abstract: TPC Harding Park in San Francisco will host the Match Play Championship in 2015, the PGA Championship in 2020 and the Presidents Cup in 2025.
lead_paragraph: T.P.C. Harding Park in San Francisco will host the Match Play Championship in 2015, the P.G.A. Championship in 2020 and the Presidents Cup in 2025.

headline.main: Match Play Gets New Format for 2015 Championship
